00150 
00175     PX_FORCE_INLINE PxShape*    createShape(const PxGeometry& geometry, const PxMaterial& material, const PxTransform& localPose = PxTransform::createIdentity())
00176     {
00177         PxMaterial* materialPtr = const_cast<PxMaterial*>(&material);
00178         return createShape(geometry, &materialPtr, 1, localPose);
00179     }
00180
